rooms.description: A spacious area combining a foyer, reception area, and integrated seating space. Vastu principles ensure the entrance faces east or north for optimal energy flow.
An open-plan layout connecting dining and kitchen areas with colonial style fixtures. Windows are designed to face east to invite natural light and positive vibes.
Located on the northern side in accordance with Vastu for better health, featuring ample closet space and a personal balcony.
A secondary bedroom designed to maintain privacy while ensuring natural light. Windows oriented towards south-east per Vastu norms.
A dedicated quiet zone with ample shelving and comfortable seating, positioned in the west or north-west to harness intellectual energy as suggested by Vastu principles.
Provides privacy for guests along with a small bathroom. Windows aligned as per colonial aesthetic and Vastu recommendations.

openings.details: Colonial-style door, weather-resistant, ensuring robust security and alignment with the farmhouse's aesthetics.
Large, casement windows for ample light, with shutters that can provide privacy while allowing natural ventilation.
A double-entry garage door to accommodate two vehicles, designed with a colonial facade that blends with the exterior architecture.
